moves.name: Defense Curl
moves.description: The user curls up to conceal weak spots and raise its Defense stat.

moves.name: Powder Snow
moves.description: The user attacks with a chilling gust of powdery snow. It may also freeze the targets.

moves.name: Growl
moves.description: The user growls in an endearing way, making the opposing team less wary. The foes' Attack stats are lowered.

moves.name: Water Gun
moves.description: The target is blasted with a forceful shot of water.

moves.name: Encore
moves.description: The user compels the target to keep using only the move it last used for three turns.

moves.name: Ice Ball
moves.description: The user continually rolls into the target over five turns. It becomes stronger each time it hits.

moves.name: Body Slam
moves.description: The user drops onto the target with its full body weight. It may also leave the target with paralysis.

moves.name: Aurora Beam
moves.description: The target is hit with a rainbow-colored beam. This may also lower the target's Attack stat.

moves.name: Hail
moves.description: The user summons a hailstorm lasting five turns. It damages all Pokémon except the Ice type.

moves.name: Rest
moves.description: The user goes to sleep for two turns. It fully restores the user's HP and heals any status problem.

moves.name: Snore
moves.description: An attack that can be used only if the user is asleep. The harsh noise may also make the target flinch.

moves.name: Blizzard
moves.description: A howling blizzard is summoned to strike the opposing team. It may also freeze them solid.

moves.name: Sheer Cold
moves.description: The target is attacked with a blast of absolute-zero cold. The target instantly faints if it hits.
